content: texture color and quick to work up the country spice crochet headband has it all the headband is worked from the bottom up then the texture is added with a technique i call the horizontal single_crochet the headband is written in baby-adult sizes and measures approx 5 wide finish with a cute front accent and you have a beautiful headband fun to make in so many colors and great for leftover yarn materials size h 5 00 mm crochet hook medium worsted weight yarn i used hobby lobby s i love this yarn in a variety of colors tapestry needle you will need to know how to -single_crochet -double_crochet - work in back loops only
